citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm on
16-Nov-16.
Farm worker told the inspector that Mr. Schwartz was out and not return until late evening.

narrative:
